content.en: Fluid Flow Optimization: Researchers are exploring the role of shape optimization in computational fluid dynamics. They are using algorithms to solve optimization problems related to fluid flow, such as minimizing dissipated energy and deriving shape gradients. These algorithms are helping to improve the design and stability of fluid flow fields.
content.da: Optimering af væskestrøm: Forskere undersøger formenoptimerings rolle i beregningsbaseret væskedynamik. De bruger algoritmer til at løse optimeringsproblemer relateret til væskestrøm, såsom at minimere spildt energi og udlede formgradienter. Disse algoritmer hjælper med at forbedre design og stabilitet af væskestrømsfelter.
